summary: Import a data cube from a workspace
description: Imports a previously exported data cube from a specified workspace location. This allows for reusing preprocessed data (e.g., cloud-removed, gap-filled, aggregated) across different machine learning workflows.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the data cube to import. This should match the name used when the data cube was exported.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The folder path within the server backend workspace where the data cube is stored. This should match the folder path used when the data cube was exported.

returns.description: The imported data cube that can be used in subsequent processing steps.
